name: Asterogues (itch)
description:
Asterogues is a shoot-em-up / bullet hell hybrid roguelite where you play as a band of outcasts exiled to the Asteroid Belt on their quest for revenge! Weave your way through the bullet storm and turn the bullets back on your attackers!

DEMO:
The demo is currently playable, showing off the first zone, the Asteroid Belt! Please try it out and leave a review! 

Please note that there is some meta progress (permanent progress across runs) but as the demo is still quite short there isn't currently a save function- and that it runs best when downloaded. If you play in browser, hit fullscreen.

If you cant afford to pay anything, thats fine, please consider sharing if you enjoyed it!

-------------------------------------------------------------
Controls:
WASD/Arrows: movement

Left Mouse Button: Tap for melee, Hold for your signature attack.
Right Mouse Button: Use active item
Spacebar: Dash

Left Mouse Button to interact with pickups, dialogue and NPCs.
